name: Joseph KAREMERAÂ RN

bio: Joseph Karemera has been working in Rwanda health care system for more than five years, his experience range from clinical, public health, and Research. He is clinical Nutritionist and Dietician by training. His career focuses in Non-communicable disease prevention, management and control and Research. Using he is gained knowledge and skills in Nutrition and dietetic together with his masterâ€™s degree in Public health and disease control, he is mission aims to establish at which level the primary non-communicable diseases risk factors lead to secondary risk factors such as elevated blood pressure and sugarâ€¦etc. and its reverse using medical nutrition therapy in AfricaÂ Population.
